introduction: SYNOPSISIntelligent vagabond Mun Do-yub thinks he's failed at life. He takes a little money from his home and runs away to Seoul with his friend, Jung Dong-ho. Do-yub's half-brother chases after the two. They run into Yu Eun-ji. Afterwards, the three become companions. Before reaching Seoul, Dong-ho runs away, betraying Do-yub and Eun-ji. The three each live miserable lives. Then the three get back together due to Eun-ji's efforts. They plant grass and flowers in the city. They work ceaselessly to find a new life. Later, they commit crimes again and are fated to run away from the city.故事他认为自己一生失败的月东董，从家里退出一些资金，逃往首尔，郑东浩跟随他。他们被坟墓的半兄弟追赶，沿着积雪覆盖的山脉跑去，遇到一个充满了温暖的爱情的女人余安姬，三人变成了命运的伴侣。在东和访首尔之前，他逃到了Dohyeop和Eunji的边缘，他们生活在徘徊和悲伤中。她再次离开无人居住的女子Eunji分享她的爱，东和像剑一样生活。然而，由于Eunji，他们三人聚集在一起，不知疲倦地工作，在城市里找到种植和开花的生活。但是，他们正在命运再犯罪，逃离城市。
